attributes.action: Make available more Council Housing for Married Childless Couples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Has a Married Couple we cannot get Council Housing even though I Myself have had 3 Council properties beforehand. we had to move out of our Council property due to personal circumstances and into private rental which we need help with to pay the rent however this help will not be available indefiantly and I myself cannot work don't get any Benefits.
